mentor.name: Sam
mentor.bio: Need a pep talk? I'm here for you!

mentor.name: Bradford
mentor.bio: Bradford was a programmer who's ambitions to create a platform for local video work were tragically halted, when he wishd for a genie to help him with his tinder photo.

mentor.name: Luther
mentor.bio: For the love of God, someone please date me so I can stop bringing my Mom to costume parties.

mentor.name: Miriam
mentor.bio: On our first date, I'll carve our names in a tree. It's the most romantic way to let you know I have knives.

mentor.name: Shane
mentor.bio: Last time I was someone's type I was donating blood.

mentor.name: Ervin
mentor.bio: One day I was at the grocery store and this elderly lady was in front of me and the total bill for her groceries was $300 but her card declined. You already know what I did--God's gonna bless me one day. It was a lot of groceries, but I helped her put it all back.

mentor.name: Kim
mentor.bio: I hope you like bad girls because I'm literally bad at everything.

mentor.name: Jessie
mentor.bio: Don't buy Colage whitening toothpaste. It says guaranteed whiteness in 14 days. It's been 2 weeks and I'm still Asian.
